alert.note: Alert for Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:10AM CST until January 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Washington IL County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
